title: Explored Python Data Science
body: Completed various Coursera courses (Data Analyses, Databases and SQL, ...). Decided this area didn't interest me, it feels more like statistics than programming.

title: Exploring web development with Python
body: Started playing with web APIs like the Spotify API to get top tracks and artists. Lead to me tinkering with Flask web framework

title: First Site - spotifystats.xyz
body: Made my first website. Uses Spotify API to access a user's top tracks/artists. Learned a lot of Flask/general web development and bootstrap. Also learned how to configure Ngninx on my Linode vps and deploy the site myself.

title: lsts.xyz
body: A todo list site. This site was made with the intent to learn databases and forms. I used SQLAlchemy ORM with a SQLite database.

title: First API - api.psts.xyz
body: My first API. This was made with the intent to learn making REST apis. I also wrote integration tests for every endpoint. Learned using a separate test database, mocking data and monkeypatching functions.

title: Front end for API - fastapi.psts.xyz
body: This was a front end made to be used with api.psts.xyz. Learned my API endpoints could be improved. Had endpoints for individual posts or replies only, made endpoints that provided posts complete with nested replies. Also learned how to manage multiple domains and sub-domains when I deployed this on my Linode vps.

title: Started learning javascript
body: Started following the the foundations track at The Odin Project. Learned the fundamentals of javascript. At this point I switched to Ubuntu as my OS while working, started using vscode and did all of my git through the command line.

title: Continued learning javascript
body: Loosely followed along with The Odin Project as some subjects I'd covered already in Python. Lots of projects made during this time such as rock paper scissors, drawing-pad, a calculator. Got practice with webpack, babel, Dom manipulation, ES6.

title: Started learning React
body: Did many projects from The Odin Project to learn React such as a resume builder, a memory game and a shopping cart. Got practice with class based and functional components, state, props, lifecycle methods (briefly) and hooks.

title: Started learning nodejs/express
body: Did many projects from The Odin Project to learn nodejs/express such as an inventory application, mini message board and an app to practice various user permission levels. Got practice with mongoDB, writing and using middleware, and testing.

title: Further projects and job search
body: As I am nearing my time running out on learning full time, I am working on another large project. I am making a calorie counting app with an nodejs/express back end and a react front end. I also started this personal portfolio website before I begin looking for a job. Thanks for reading this far!
